title: Candied spiced pumpkin

ingredients.content: 2 vanilla beans, split in half lengthways and seeds scraped
1000 g Kent pumpkin, cut into thick wedges (approx. 2 cm thick), skin on
75 - 100 g orange blossom water, to taste

preparations.content: Place sugar, cloves, cardamom pods, vanilla pods and seeds, bay leaf, cinnamon and water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position, then weigh pumpkin into it. Secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10-15 min/Varoma/speed 2<b> or until slightly soft. Remove Varoma and carefully divide pumpkin between sterilised sealable jars.

Add orange blossom water (to taste) into mixing bowl and mix <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer syrup and spices into jars to cover pumpkin, seal and place into refrigerator for a minimum of 24 hours. Serve as desired (over ice cream, with pancakes or pastries).

hintsAndTricks: You can store this candied pumpkin in the refrigerator for up to 3 months.
